This chunk is part of a larger function that manipulates ELF binaries to modify their run-time path (rpath) settings. The code reads string tables from an ELF file to extract shared library dependencies and processes dynamic sections to update or remove existing rpath/runpath entries, ensuring that the binary can find its required libraries when deployed.

Context: Handling platform-specific build steps for Linux by modifying ELF binaries to adjust their dependency paths for proper deployment.

            elf.seek(offset)
            data = elf.read(entsize)
            tag, val = struct.unpack_from(dynamic_struct, data)
